alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marquette County through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Negaunee, or near Ishpeming, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marquette, Presque Isle, Trowbridge Park and Harvey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
